page.title: 10HEALTH - PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: HEALTH The area is served by the{N.H.S.}but some people pay extra insurance to get {private medicine}which gives some priority treatment. Local doctors are at{TRURO}and{CARNON DOWNS.}To see a doctor you make an appointment. Dentists operate a similar system. Accidents and major surgery are dealt with in{TRURO hospitals.} The general health in this area is good because it is an open space. Children's hearing, teeth & health are checked at school. CLUBS FOR YOUNG AND OLD Young people like excitment and noise. The old enjoy getting out and quiet excitment. Most clubs meet in the evening. For the young there are {Cubs,Brownies,Guides,Scouts}and {Beavers}and for the old there is {bingo,}and the{Monday Club.
